goal_descEN: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
target_descEN: Increase scientific knowledge, develop research capacity and transfer marine technology, taking into account the Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission Criteria and Guidelines on the Transfer of Marine Technology, in order to improve ocean health and to enhance the contribution of marine biodiversity to the development of developing countries, in particular small island developing States and least developed countries
indicator_descEN: Proportion of total research budget allocated to research in the field of marine technology
series_tags: ['means of implementation', 'research and development', 'marine resources', 'marine ecosystems']
seriesDescription: National ocean science expenditure as a share of total research and development funding (%)
footnotes: DFO - only data for the Fisheries and Oceans Canada
sources: Country submission for Ocean Science data and UIS for R/D
